applepromotionconten.description: *Price and Visa Reward Card offers are available to new residential customers who use 1,500 Ccf per year or less, enrolling with Ohio Natural Gas between  {{currentMonthFirstDay}} and {{currentMonthLastDay}} using applicable promotion code; Visa Reward Card offer available only for such customers enrolling online at www.onlyong.com/COMPARE1C. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Ohio Choice program through Columbia Gas of Ohio. ONG prices do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.800.970.3142, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit onlyong.com. Early termination charges will apply for residential fixed price plans (6-Month plan: $75). Customer must have continuous active service with Ohio Natural Gas for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the reward card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Cannot be combined with any other offer. ƗPrice comparison claim based on PUCO Apples-to-Apples website published 6-month fixed prices as of 01/02/2018 and ONG's January 2018 direct mail price offers.
applepromotionconten.heading: Special Bonus: Enroll online and receive a {{giftCardValue | currency:"$":0}} Visa® Reward Card!*
